channel.title: Need lots of help, im new
channel.description: Well first off, i made started a server in the beginning, im the only one in it besides NPCS. I was wondering how i can switch to ancient magicks and also multiply item ammounts wen i spawn them. All help is appeciated. Btw some items i try to spawn become obby mauls or something noted. I try to unnote them and it wont work. I also wondered how u can change your character's appearance, ie. hair color/style and skin color.

item.title: Need lots of help, im new
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Isnt there just like something u can do besides those files, no idea how to use them. i mean i just wanna change character in my private ip server

Read full topic
